message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for sale. I think you'll really love it!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7500. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
Thank you for your offer, Bob! I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I'm still a bit above your budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $8200?
I'm still a bit hesitant to go above $7500, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about $8000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Bob! However, I'm still a bit above your budget. I'm willing to make one more concession. How about $8100?
I appreciate your willingness to make a concession, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to make a counteroffer of $7800. Can you meet me there?
